name: ilmbase

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: OpenEXR ILM Base libraries (high dynamic-range image file format)

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: py-ilmbase
dependent_to.description:
The PyIlmBase libraries provides python bindings for the IlmBase
libraries.

dependent_to.name: openvdb
dependent_to.description: OpenVDB - a sparse volume data format.

dependent_to.name: openscenegraph
dependent_to.description:
OpenSceneGraph is an open source, high performance 3D graphics toolkit
that's used in a variety of visual simulation applications.

dependent_to.name: openexr
dependent_to.description: OpenEXR Graphics Tools (high dynamic-range image file format)
